paragraphs.content: Psalm 102
paragraphs.contentHtml: Psalm 102

paragraphs.content: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed, and poureth out his complaint before the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: A Prayer of the afflicted, when he is overwhelmed, and poureth out his complaint before the Lord.

paragraphs.content: Hear my prayer, O LORD, and let my cry come unto thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hear my prayer, O Lord, and let my cry come unto thee.

paragraphs.content: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day when I call answer me speedily.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Hide not thy face from me in the day when I am in trouble; incline thine ear unto me: in the day when I call answer me speedily.

paragraphs.content: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For my days are consumed like smoke, and my bones are burned as an hearth.

paragraphs.content: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My heart is smitten, and withered like grass; so that I forget to eat my bread.

paragraphs.content: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.
paragraphs.contentHtml: By reason of the voice of my groaning my bones cleave to my skin.

paragraphs.content: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I am like a pelican of the wilderness: I am like an owl of the desert.

paragraphs.content: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I watch, and am as a sparrow alone upon the house top.

paragraphs.content: Mine enemies reproach me all the day; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Mine enemies reproach me all the day; and they that are mad against me are sworn against me.

paragraphs.content: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,
paragraphs.contentHtml: For I have eaten ashes like bread, and mingled my drink with weeping,

paragraphs.content: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Because of thine indignation and thy wrath: for thou hast lifted me up, and cast me down.

paragraphs.content: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.
paragraphs.contentHtml: My days are like a shadow that declineth; and I am withered like grass.

paragraphs.content: But thou, O LORD, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou, O Lord, shalt endure for ever; and thy remembrance unto all generations.

paragraphs.content: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Thou shalt arise, and have mercy upon Zion: for the time to favour her, yea, the set time, is come.

paragraphs.content: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For thy servants take pleasure in her stones, and favour the dust thereof.

paragraphs.content: So the heathen shall fear the name of the LORD, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.
paragraphs.contentHtml: So the heathen shall fear the name of the Lord, and all the kings of the earth thy glory.

paragraphs.content: When the LORD shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When the Lord shall build up Zion, he shall appear in his glory.

paragraphs.content: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He will regard the prayer of the destitute, and not despise their prayer.

paragraphs.content: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: This shall be written for the generation to come: and the people which shall be created shall praise the Lord.

paragraphs.content: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the LORD behold the earth;
paragraphs.contentHtml: For he hath looked down from the height of his sanctuary; from heaven did the Lord behold the earth;

paragraphs.content: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;
paragraphs.contentHtml: To hear the groaning of the prisoner; to loose those that are appointed to death;

paragraphs.content: To declare the name of the LORD in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;
paragraphs.contentHtml: To declare the name of the Lord in Zion, and his praise in Jerusalem;

paragraphs.content: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the LORD.
paragraphs.contentHtml: When the people are gathered together, and the kingdoms, to serve the Lord.

paragraphs.content: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.
paragraphs.contentHtml: He weakened my strength in the way; he shortened my days.

paragraphs.content: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years are throughout all generations.
paragraphs.contentHtml: I said, O my God, take me not away in the midst of my days: thy years are throughout all generations.

paragraphs.content: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens are the work of thy hands.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Of old hast thou laid the foundation of the earth: and the heavens are the work of thy hands.

paragraphs.content: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:
paragraphs.contentHtml: They shall perish, but thou shalt endure: yea, all of them shall wax old like a garment; as a vesture shalt thou change them, and they shall be changed:

paragraphs.content: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.
paragraphs.contentHtml: But thou art the same, and thy years shall have no end.

paragraphs.content: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: The children of thy servants shall continue, and their seed shall be established before thee.
